overview: Respected lawyer, Henry Turner survives a convenience-store shooting only to find he has lost his memory, and has serious speech and mobility issues. After also losing his job—where he no longer 'fits in'—his loving wife and daughter give him all their love and support.
tagline: His life was based on power, success, and ruthlessness. Until a bullet made him think again.
cast: Harrison Ford|Annette Bening|Bill Nunn|Rebecca Miller|Bruce Altman
